pages.text: $(li)The Lock is an item which can be used to lock Chests.$(br)$(li)To use, you only have to rename it in an Anvil, then you have to right click the Chest while you are holding the Lock on your hand.
$(li)A locked Chest can only be opened using an item which has the same name as the lock.$(br)$(li)For example, a lock named Password requires a key named Password.
$(li)A lock can be removed by shift right clicking on the Chest with a Key that has the same name as the lock.
